Text: Looks like the file is screwed up by a couple of duplicate pages at the end. Which in turn makes me wonder if any pages are missing.

^I just read it and the comic is complete. The last 2 pages are redundant but just ignore them.

Now ... HOLY SHIT DAN SLOTT ... oh wow he got me. I didn't see that coming. The funny thing is, reading the first 2/3 of the book, I kept wondering what wasn't right ... definitely the Comic Book of the Week.

Thanks for the upload. The quality of the scan is mediocre - blacks aren't black and colours are weak. It's great for free, but not up to the usual standard of comic scans. A perfect copy is here (and smaller file size too) :
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7847790/Amazing_Spider-Man_698
